plot: A phantom horseman who appears every night with a human head tucked under his arm lets it be known that he is searching for eight gunfighters.
title: Curse of the Headless Horseman
plot_es: A phantom horseman who appears every night with a human head tucked under his arm lets it be known that he is searching for eight gunfighters.
plot_en: A phantom horseman who appears every night with a human head tucked under his arm lets it be known that he is searching for eight gunfighters.
